traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The dragon can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Tunneler
entries: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and can leave a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5 damage) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8 damage) thunder damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d6 + 5 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Debilitating Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a pulse of high-pitched, nearly inaudible sound in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 33 (6d10 damage) thunder damage and is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):
